item.title: Random items and jad
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; int rareItem[] = {6570,950};//you can have as many ids as you want ppl.addItem(rareItem[(int)(Math.random()*rareItem.length)], 1); ppl.sendMessage("The minigame is complete! Heres your Fire Cape!"); ppl.teleportToX = 3093; ppl.teleportToY = 3491; }

look on comment on how to add random item ids

item.title: Random items and jad
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

well, i have a mini-game in my server. and at the end you’re teleported away and a Firecape is put in your inventory. i was wondering how i’d make it so it gives me a random rare item?

this is the end of the minigame.

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.addItem(6570, 1); ppl.sendMessage("The minigame is complete! Heres your Fire Cape!"); ppl.teleportToX = 3093; ppl.teleportToY = 3491; }
what will i change to it to make it a random item between 6570 or 1038?

also… does anybody have the code to make jad die like in runescape? i’ve had it on my server but accidently replaced my server with another and had to get my backup wich unfortunately didn’t have it. :([br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 10:59:25 PM[/size][hr]nobody can help?

Read full topic
